title: US Senator Slotkin Speaks on US Relationship with Europe
description: Sen. Elissa Slotkin (D) Michigan speaks on the US's standing on the global stage and relationship with Europe, tariffs, and more. She speaks with Bloomberg's Oliver Crook from the sidelines of the Munich Security Conference in Germany. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Sen. Elissa Slotkin (D) Michigan speaks on the US's standing on the global stage and relationship with Europe, tariffs, and more. She speaks with Bloomberg's Oliver Crook from the sidelines of the Munich Security Conference in Germany. (Source: Bloomberg)
